thread.title: Shia LaBeouf Arrested and Booked for Public Intoxication in Austin
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf Arrested and Booked for Public Intoxication in Austin

author: kiannasims
title: Shia LaBeouf Arrested and Booked for Public Intoxication in Austin
text:
Shia LaBeouf Arrested and Booked for Public Intoxication in Austin October 11, 2015 Rapidnewsnetwork Entertainment No comments 
A witness told the site that Shia was either “extremely drunk or high on drugs when he ran down the street and jaywalked in front of police”. He was then subdued, cuffed and taken to Travis County Jail. The police warned him to stop but he disobeyed. 
The arrest took place within Austin’s entertainment district along 6th Street, where the Austin City Limits Music Festival, which the actor is in town for, is now under way through the weekend. Another witness told TMZ that prior to the arrest, LaBeouf and another woman were denied entry into another bar nearby due to their apparent drunkenness. 
Actor Shia LaBeouf has found himself in more trouble with the law. Shia LaBeouf was arrested in Austin, Texas for public intoxication. 
For refusing to leave a theatrical performance when asked, for creating unreasonable noise and using obscene language outside of Studio 54, and for spitting at a police officer at the Midtown North police precinct. 
He was ordered to go to substance-abuse treatment, and as part of his plea deal, LaBeouf’s case would be dismissed and sealed if he’d displayed good behavior for six months. 
As of press time, several outlets are still awaiting comment from representatives of the 29-year-old actor. 
LaBeouf, 29, was arrested on the misdemeanor charge at 7:33 p.m. Friday, the Austin Police Department said in a news release. 
Last year, the actor was arrested after smoking a cigarette and being disruptive in the audience of the Broadway revival of “Cabaret“.
